means: 明确的
特种的
具体的
[免疫学]特效的
特效药
特性
细节
显著的性质，特性

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均含"具体的"之意。
means: concrete ： 指通过感官能看到、听到、触到的具体东西。其反义词是abstract。
specific ： 侧重指具体的细节，是与general(一般)，vague(模糊)相对的具体。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"明确的"之意。
means: explicit ： 指清楚明白，毫不含糊其辞，因而无任何理解困难。
definite ： 指对所提到的事的范围及其细节毫无疑问，含有明确和确定界限的意味。
specific ： 强调内容明确，毫不抽象、笼统。
express ： 语气较强，较正式，指不但清楚明确，而且含有直截了当和有力等的意思。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"特殊的，特别的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: special, especial, specific, particular, exceptional, extraordinary, peculiar
means: special ： 普通用词，指不同于一般、与众不同，着重事物的专门性，突出与一般不同。
especial和special含义很接近，较正式，但侧重有特殊的意义或重要性。
specific ： 着重指某种、某类事物具有的特殊或特定的属性，也可指专门提出作特别考虑的事物。
particular ： 侧重不同于普遍性的个性或特殊性。
exceptional ： 指不同于一般，本身是特别的或异常的事物。
extraordinary ： 语气比exceptional强，指极大地超过一般或正常情况。
peculiar ： 强调指与众不同或独特的意思。

word_mean: 特种的，特殊的：单一种微生物产生的
特异的：在应用、效应等方面有约束的，对结构、功能等有限制的
特效药：专门用于某种特定疾病的特效药物
特异性的，专一性的：免疫学上对相应的抗体有特殊亲和力的

sentence.Network_en: Your decision must be translated into specific, concrete actions.
sentence.Network_cn: 你的决定必须转化为具体明确的行动。

sentence.Network_en: I'll start with some generalities and then examine a few specific examples.
sentence.Network_cn: 我首先进行概述，然后会分析几个实例。

sentence.Network_en: Most companies are looking to sponsor students on specific courses.
sentence.Network_cn: 大部分公司在寻求机会资助学习某些特定课程的学生.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (originally in the sense 'having a special determining quality'): from late Latin specificus, from Latin species (see species)

entry.tran: (部位、问题、题目等)特定的，特别的
entry.def: You use specific to refer to a particular fixed area, problem, or subject.

example.ex: Massage may help to increase blood flow to specific areas of the body...
example.tran: 按摩有助于增加身体特定部位的血液流量。

example.ex: There are several specific problems to be dealt with...
example.tran: 有几个特定问题需要解决。

entry.def: If someone is specific, they give a description that is precise and exact. You can also use specific to describe their description.

example.ex: I asked him to be more specific...
example.tran: 我要求他说得更具体些。

example.ex: These nerve centres generate rhythmic movements; or to be more specific, rhythmic stomach movements...
example.tran: 这些神经中心产生有节奏的运动，或者更确切地说，是有节奏的肠胃蠕动。

entry.tran: 特有的;独特的;只与…有关的
entry.def: Something that is specific to a particular thing is connected with that thing only.

example.ex: Send your resume with a cover letter that is specific to that particular job.
example.tran: 寄出你的简历并附上一份针对那个特定工作岗位的附函。

means.word_mean: 1. a fact about some part (as opposed to general);

sentences.sentence: "he always reasons from the particular to the general"

means.word_mean: 2. a medicine that has a mitigating effect on a specific disease;
1. (sometimes followed by `to') applying to or characterized by or distinguishing something particular or special or unique;

sentences.sentence: "a specific and detailed account of the accident"

means.word_mean: 3. relating to or distinguishing or constituting a taxonomic species;
4. being or affecting a disease produced by a particular microorganism or condition; used also of stains or dyes used in making microscope slides;

sentences.sentence: "a specific stain is one having a specific affinity for particular structural elements"

auth_sentence.content: Take the specific case of Jesus and King David.
auth_sentence.res_content: Take the specific case of Jesus and King David.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Take the specific case of Jesus and King David.

auth_sentence.content: Tom Shakespeare was much more specific in his goal.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tom Shakespeare was much more specific in his goal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tom Shakespeare was much more specific in his goal.

auth_sentence.content: It is NOT any republican or democrat specific problem.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is NOT any republican or democrat specific problem.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is NOT any republican or democrat specific problem.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+specific特有的→共同特有的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+al……的→adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 明确的,具体的;特定的,特有的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+fic→具体的,特有的
e+special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]→adj.特别的, 特殊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 似是而非的,华而不实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+ous……的→外观相似而实质不同
especial[adj.特别的, 特殊的]+ly表副词→adv.特别, 尤其
special特殊的,专门的+ist专家或人→n.专门医师, 专家
special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]+ity表名词→n.[specialty]特性,性质;专业/长;特产
speci外观,种类,特别+es表复数→[所有]种类
specific[adj.明确的,具体的;特定的,特有的]+ation表名词→n.详述;[常n.]规格,说明书,规范
speci外观,种类,特别+men表物品→n.标本,样本
special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]+ize化→v.[specialise][in]专攻,专门研究,专业化

stems_affixes.value_cn: 指定, 详细说明, 列入清单
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+ify表动词→specify规类→指定, 列入清单

Sentence.sentence: We judge a potential partner according to our specific cultural expectations about what romantic love should feel like.
When we talk about specific location suggestions for the factory, we'll see this in more detail, so we'll come back to this question, OK?
So there wasn't any plan and there was no specific training.
It is crafted with specific skills.

Smith has written a breezy guidebook, with a series of short chapters dedicated to specific aspects of urbanity - parks, say, or the various schemes that have been put forward over the years for building the perfect city.
Have they anything specific in mind?

means.word_mean: 明确的, 确切的, 详尽的

sentences.en: What's the specific time of his arrival?
sentences.cn: 他确切的到达时间是几点钟?

means.word_mean: 具体的, 特有的, 特定的

sentences.en: We haven't fixed a specific date for our meeting.
sentences.cn: 我们会议的具体日期还没有定下来。

means.word_mean: 仅限于…的; 只发现于…的

sentences.en: This disease is specific to this area.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病只发生在这一地区。

sentences.en: This is a specific for cancer.
sentences.cn: 这是一种治疗癌症的特效药。

sentences.en: He never talked in specific about his work.
sentences.cn: 他从不谈论有关自己工作的详情。

jushi.english: There's a specific tool for each job.
jushi.chinese: 各工种配备特定的工具。

jushi.english: The picture has a specific style.
jushi.chinese: 这幅画有一种独特的风格。

jushi.english: We haven't fixed a specific date for our meeting.
jushi.chinese: 我们会议的具体日期还没有定下来。
